ygData.subject: Re: Nagafen Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: happens to me about three or four times a week... normally when I hit my keyboard mapped hotbuttons real fast.  I just zone and it resets.  very annoying (im a
ygData.messageBody:
happens to me about three or four times a week... normally when I hit my
keyboard mapped hotbuttons real fast. I just zone and it resets. very
annoying (im a rogue, imagine how crappy it is to have to lose the poison
you applied to the blade) argh.

At 09:42 AM 09/09/1999 -0600, you wrote:
>From: Brian Godette <bgodette@...>
>
>The only time I have ever had this happen is after attempting to cast a
>spell *while* charmed or feared. After regaining control, no hot-buttons or
>spell buttons would work but I could move around just fine.
>
>At 10:49 AM 9/9/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: "Douglas Babcock" <dbabcock@...>
> >
> >Ok all you Nag killers
> >
> >We attempted Nagafen last night.
> >Giants were all a piece of cake, no deaths and no real problems.
> >
> >Heres the problem we encountered and I need to know If anyone else has
>seen
> >this.
> >
> >3 of our casters, 2 clerics and 1 enchanter lost the ability to cast
>spells
> >during the melee.
> >I don't mean we were charmed or feared or roared. I mean, all spell and
> >hotkey functions were gone, as if fear effect continued forever.
> >We were forced to camp to clear effect.
> >
> >We could have taken Nag easily if not for this. Losing 2 out of 3 clerics
> >does sort of affect the outcome of battle.
> >
> >This is not a bitch nor am I inviting complaints
> >
> >I need to know if anyone else has encountered this. We had a nice long
>talk
> >with our Servers head GM and she wants to know as well so they can fix
>this.
> >
> >Thanks in advance
> >
> >Joatmos
> >Xegony.
> >
> >
> >
